lines: 1. Nimba omobe mono,Yes'ere nankwerete;Agakwa inkonyeke,Agakwa imbe moyo,Buna rit' as'omote,Imbe nere botambe.
2. Obwanchani bwa Yeso,Botambe gochia igoroBwaetania chindiba,Boreo korwa kare,'Bwanchani bwanyorete,'Kero nche nasirete.
3. Nimba omobe mono,Kristo mbionsi ase nde;Omanyir,Okogania,Biane bionsi nebiaye,Nandende korwa ense,Ongacheir' Obogima.
